message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this unique product with you. I think you'll find it's a game-changer in your industry. Would you like to make an offer on it?
I'm interested in the product, but I think $1500000 is a bit steep. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $1250000. Can we discuss further?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm afraid I was thinking more along the lines of $1400000. I believe the product's value will be worth it to you in the long run.

I understand that you think the product's value will be worth it in the long run, but I'm still not convinced. I'm willing to go up to $1300000, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. Can we meet somewhere in the middle?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $1300000, Bob, but I think you're still undervaluing the product. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to get at least $1450000 for it. Can we discuss further?

I understand that you need to make a profit, but $1450000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to go up to $1350000, but that's as high as I can go. I'm starting to think that buying from John for $1000000 might be a better option for me.
